data.message: Facebook I’m so desperate something happened to me you guys read all of our stuff n can track our post so you can put 2  n 2 together I knw that people in higher places n your tech u can change this I was robbed of my humanity I was made to feel that what I’m going threw is nothing but I pick up communications threw frequencies tv fm am white nose I have a web off people in my head I can’t get out I feel like no one else dose but I knw it’s real I lost everything my wife my kids is this a game? Or are we all super computers
